OOC: In case from the craziness of my past posts you couldn't tell 
Rhesus is sort of a Kung Fu guy who feels he lost his honor (except 
now it's because they abandoned and outpost).

Rhesus has the 2 thrusters/cannons down and is rummaging in the 
shuttle for tools.  He picks up a small holograpic projector and looks 
sadly at it.  He sits down and begins to meditate.  He turns on the 
projector. A picture of a girl bot comes up. The projector starts 
playing a recording of a woman singing the "Outlaw Star" theme:


                I don't know
                what words I can say.
                The wind has a way
                to talk to me.
                Flowers sleep
                a silent lullaby.
                I pray for reply.
                I'm reeeeaaaaady.
                (I forget how the next verse goes and that's actually 
a traslated version they sing twice in the series not the one they 
sing at the end of each episode in Japanese).



 During this Rhesus has flashbacks (hey I needed to introduce some 
conflict).  A small out post with the girl, Mustex, Stallex is born, 
they constantly try with there few resorces to figure out why Stallex 
has to constantly upgrade like organics to adulthood over the last 10 
months (I just dicided to say he ages 12 times faster than human kids 
although it will stop after 20 months and return to normal), then an 
attack, fighters are everywhere, they four of them are running to the 
shuttle, 20 ft. away she's grabbed from behind, she's held around the 
neck by a large shadowy bot he can't quite make out, she screams at 
him to go, he screams he won't but pushed the button to close the door 
anyway like a coward, and the shuttle takes off.

He stands up crying. He stops still looking sad.  He gets his tools 
and gets back to work on the cannons.
